privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This service is provided as a hobby project. We respect your privacy and only collect the minimum amount of data necessary to function.
privacy.data_collection_text: We collect the display names and guess details (date, weight, color) you voluntarily provide. We do not require accounts or passwords. Events and all associated data are automatically deleted 1 year after creation.
privacy.cookies_text: We use essential cookies only to store your session state (e.g. if you have already guessed). We also use Cloudflare Turnstile for spam protection.
privacy.contact_text: If you wish to have your data removed, please contact the event organizer or the administrator.
